result.title: Hokkaido Univ. & Hitachi New-concept Computing Contest 2017
result.content:
Hello everyone!

Itâ€™s our pleasure to announce the Hokkaido Univ. & Hitachi New-concept Computing Contest 2017. It is a marathon-type programming contest sponsored jointly by Hokkaido University and Hitachi, Ltd. The contest consists of two independent parts which will be held in two consecutive rounds.

  • 1st Contest: from November 15th to November 28th, 2017
  • 2nd Contest: from November 29th to December 12th, 2017

Each contest provides a problem related to graph conversion algorithms, which are regarded as the key technology of the new-concept computing. The top scoring participant of each contest will be awarded 300,000 Yen. You can register your participation through the following web sites:

  • Hokkaido Univ. & Hitachi 1st New-concept Computing Contest 2017
  • Hokkaido Univ. & Hitachi 2nd New-concept Computing Contest 2017

We look forward to your participation!
